nagios_check_config.name: check_disk
nagios_check_config.usage: check_disk -w limit -c limit [-W limit] [-K limit] {-p path | -x device} [-C] [-E] [-e] [-f] [-g group ] [-k] [-l] [-M] [-m] [-R path ] [-r path ][-t timeout] [-u unit] [-v] [-X type] [-N type] [-n]

nagios_check_config.name: check_dns
nagios_check_config.usage: check_dns -H host [-s server] [-q type ] [-a expected-address] [-A] [-n] [-t timeout] [-w warn] [-c crit]

nagios_check_config.name: check_dhcp
nagios_check_config.usage: check_dhcp [-v] [-u] [-s serverip] [-r requestedip] [-t timeout][-i interface] [-m mac]
